SimulationFramework

Class Connector

  • java.lang.Object
    • SimulationFramework.Connector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable

    public class Connector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Drawable
    Connector is used to draw lines between points on the simulation's canvas. Often Connectors are used to join 2 Markers. In algorithm simulation Connectors can be either temporary or permanent. Permanent connectors are only cleared when the simulation's "Reset" option is selected. Temporary connectors are cleared when the simulation's "Clear" option is selected.
    Since:
    1/26/2014
